channel.title: Guild Wars 2
channel.description:
How come there isn't a thread about this game yet? Or am i really bad at searching?
[url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FjCehYrEbO0[/url] - Teaser trailer [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=v-9jBKF9-OI[/url] - Release date trailer [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=I6zBTOwuSh0[/url] - Dynamic events gameplay
Oh well, i thought i would make a thread about Guild Wars 2, because it is the game that i am most excited about this year. It just takes everything good from all MMO's, and puts it all together. At the same time, the game just looks beautiful! Dynamic events and the removal of the holy trinity is just awesome.
So, am i the only one looking forward to this?

Oh well, i thought i would make a thread about Guild Wars 2, because it is the game that i am most excited about this year. It just takes everything good from all MMO’s, and puts it all together. At the same time, the game just looks beautiful! Dynamic events and the removal of the holy trinity is just awesome.

So, am i the only one looking forward to this?
